project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on a CSV File
project_plan.description: Create a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file, allowing users to calculate and display the mean, median, and mode for specified numerical columns.

task.name: Set up the project structure and install necessary libraries (e.g., pandas, numpy, statistics)
Implement functionality to load a CSV file
Implement a function to calculate the mean for specified numerical columns
Implement a function to calculate the median for specified numerical columns
Implement a function to calculate the mode for specified numerical columns
Write tests for each of the analysis functions (mean, median, mode)
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
